prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon featuring sharp, spiky fins and a sleek body.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a sea creature with vibrant blue scales and flowing fins.
Generate a unique aquatic Pokemon inspired by mythical sea dragons and marine life.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of both a seahorse and a dragon.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in underwater environments, with distinct features like bright colors and fins.
Give me a water-type Pokemon that has a fierce, determined look and sharp spines.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the ocean, showcasing bold blue and white colors.
